prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon with metallic gray armor and striking blue eyes.
I want to design a Pokemon that resembles a small armored creature with a tough exterior.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body shape and unique blue accents on its surface.
Make a Pokemon that has a sturdy appearance, perfect for defensive strategies in battles.
Imagine a creature with a shiny, metallic finish and a friendly expression.
Show me a Pokemon that can thrive in rocky terrains and is known for its resilience.
Give me a small, compact Pokemon that embodies strength and determination in its design.
